    vs_3_0
    def c4, 256, -32768, 1, 0
    def c5, 0.5, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_color o0.xyz
    dcl_color1 o1
    dcl_texcoord o2.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o3.xy
    dcl_texcoord4 o4
    dcl_position o5

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mad r0.x, v0.w, c4.x, v0.z
    add r0.x, r0.x, c4.y
    mul r0.z, r0.x, c12.y
    mov r1.x, c12.x
    mad r0.xy, v0, r1.x, c13.zwzw
    add o2.xyz, r0, c11
    add r0.xy, r0, c5.x
    mul o3.xy, r0, c13
    mul r1.xy, c12.y, v1
    mov r1.zw, c4
    dp3 r0.x, r1.yzww, r1.yzww
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    mul r0.xyw, r0.x, r1.ywzz
    nrm r2.xyz, r1.zwxw
    mul r1.xyz, r0.xyww, r2
    mad r1.xyz, r2.zxyw, r0.ywxw, -r1
    mul r3.xyz, r0.xyww, r1
    mad r3.xyz, r0.wxyw, r1.yzxw, -r3
    dp3 r0.y, r3, r2
    slt r1.w, -r0.y, r0.y
    slt r0.y, r0.y, -r0.y
    add o1.w, -r0.y, r1.w
    mul r2.yz, r2.z, c8.xxzw
    mad r2.xy, c6.xzzw, r2.x, r2.yzzw
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, c8.xzzw
    mad r0.xy, c7.xzzw, r0.w, r0
    mov r2.z, r0.x
    mov o1.y, r0.y
    mul r0.xy, r1.x, c7.xzzw
    mad r0.xy, c6.xzzw, r1.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, c8.xzzw, r1.y, r0
    mov r2.w, r0.x
    mov o1.z, r0.y
    mov o0.xyz, r2.xzww
    mov o1.x, r2.y
    mul r0.xy, c12.x, v0
    mul r1, r0.y, c7
    mad r1, c6, r0.x, r1
    mad r0, c8, r0.z, r1
    add r0, r0, c9
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0

// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 714A2928.txt

add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o4, r0

//     mov o5, r0 // Relocated to line 83 with shadertool.py
